thread.title: The Appointment Group launches Touring App
thread.title_full: The Appointment Group launches Touring App

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: The Appointment Group launches Touring App
text:
The Appointment Group launches Touring App The Appointment Group launches Touring App Details Category: Technology   14:30 The Appointment Group has always been proud of its significant investment in leading travel technology partners, and has developed a range of in-house bespoke software solutions to enhance the experience of TAG’s music industry clients. TAG has announced their latest technological innovation, The TAG Global Touring App. 
This is an iPad / Desktop / Laptop tool for Tour Managers, Production Managers and personnel alike. The App contains amongst its many features; travel itineraries for a tour including rooming lists, riders, accommodation vouchers and hotel information and budgets. The main functionality includes: • Access to hotel service files • Passport details of all travellers • Rooming lists and vouchers
